title: So... I kind of suck top lane
body:
I want to improve as it is currently my weakest role. I mainly play renekton, but my main issue is that i get overly aggressive and either bully the lane into being cs starved or push the lane too hard and get ganked.

I want to pick up some more top laners to round out my roster, but I find a lot of top laners are not very suitable to my play style and thus i do poorly.

I have tried rumble vlad and maokai and they just don't quite go with how I am used to playing. I am thinking of trying swain, but i am open to other ideas.

My goal is to have an AD bruiser (renekton) an AP top laner (swain?) and a tank (i have no idea...)

Who should I learn and why? My goal is to learn how to play consistently well for each of the three champions so I never have an issue in champion select
